basic.description:
This course provides students with a socio-cultural analysis of the Olympic Games through a critical examination of key aspects of the Games' history, their organizational structure, women's relationship to the Games, performance enhancing substances, and the work world of high performance athletes.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36S;84P)
basic.subject: KNPE
basic.title: The Olympic Games

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 4 in a PHED or KINE Specialization Plan.
